Intro.Dialogue: Welcome to the magic city of Lolake, a city of wonder and magic and where the magnificent Lake of LoLake resides.
And today is your first day at Veneficus school of ancient magic, where all kinds of folk come to learn and study.
But before you can step foot inside Veneficus you must tell us your name.
Great! Now one of our tutors will now show you to your room.
A young blonde elf comes into view.
Ah you must be [Name], Im Ivory I'll follow you to your room.
As you and Ivory begin your walk arond the school to your room, you just cant stop looking at her, her eyes, her smiling face.
You think to yourself... this is probably what being in love feels like.
Then the feeling fades away just as you hear her say...
Well this is your room, you are pretty lucky. Normally you are supposed to live with a roommate, but he changed his mind and started at another school.
Well I'll leave your to it. You can find me in the main hall if you have any questions.
Wow, your very own room. Well this is cozy, just imagine all the things you can do here. There's even a little table for studying.
You should probably unpack all of your belongings, so you actually have a place to sleep, and don't have to do it later. Or you could go and see that elf girl again in the main hall

Go to main hall.Dialogue: You decide to go to the main hall to ask Ivory some questions about the school.
You see a blond girl in the distance, talking to a small group of people.
Two other girls and a boy. A green half orc and a purple.. vampire? The guy is just not interesting for you.
You slowly aproach them, but you don't walk far before Ivory waves you over.
Hey [Name]! Come join us. We were just gonna to talk about who we would wanna be lab partners with.
I just hope I don't end up with fucking AMY!... Can't take that girl. Always tryna impress everyone by THINKING shes smarter. She's so not.
Uhmmm... Kaya.. New boy is here you know, haha.. Whyy, don't you introduce yourself?
You notice that Ivory is blushing and looking quite embarrased.
Right! I'm sorry new guy. My name is Kaya, and I'm the strongest AND the coolest here on campus. If you need anything, or just a good massage, you can count on me.
Kaya winks at you. Was she flirting with you just now? Not that you mind.
Kaya.. Gosh..
Ivory looks even more embarrased now.
Anyway. I guess it's my turn now.. Hi, I'm Carmilla. I.. I run the.. Umm.. love club..
Carmilla is looking very tense at the moment.
That sounds really cool!
You try to show Carmilla that it isn't embarrassing. You wanna support her in her club.
REALLY?! then you might wanna join? We are only three people right now, so it would be really nice to have a fourth.
No. Sorry I have other plans.. And I'm not sure I'm even ready to be in a club yet.
You really don't wanna be a part of a LOVE club. Even though Carmilla is extremely cute, it's just not an activity for you.
Aww.. that's too bad. What if you just join for one day? And then we could spend the evening together after? Pleasseee?? Pretty please?..
Carmilla is all up in your face begging you.

Options.Name: Go to your room and study

Join the love club.Dialogue: Sure, one day won't hurt I guess.
And you also get to know Carmilla better.
Ivory looks hurt.
That's great! Now you can really get to know each other... ahha.
Alright! I'll see you tomorrow then.
She gives you a small smile before leaving.
You wake up the next day with an exciting feeling in your stomache. Today you're going to hang out with Carmilla.
*Knock knock...*
You hear a knock on the door?.. You get up from your bed to go open the door.
But.. what? No one is behind the door?...
Must have been a prank or something.. Weird.
You walk out the door to go to class.
You arrive at the class and see all three girls. Ivory, Carmilla and Kaya. It makes you more comfortable when they are around.
Hey [Name], why dont you join me? We'll make the best chemistry patners.
Carmilla, hi!
You walk over to the table Carmilla is sitting at. You notice both Kaya and Ivory stare at you while you pass by them.
Time passes, and you have actually enjoyed spending time with Carmilla, even though it's in school.
RIIINg RinG
Oop- sounds like we're done for today. You still up for our hangout?
Yes. Can't wait.
You both pack all of your stuff and leave the classroom.
You follow Carmilla to her club room. On the way you pass elves, gnomes and orcs. You notice that there aren't that many vampires like Carmilla.
You take a turn and enter a loong darn hallway. At the end of the hallway, there is a big door. But it feels like the hallway is hours long.
Something feels off...But you can't tell what it is. You thought you felt safe with Carmilla, but now she feels a bit off..
Here we are.
Carmilla steps inside and greets the others that are in there
Come on, they don't bite... That much at least.
You step inside a big room. It's dark, but has little lights all around its walls.
This is Caramil and Camil.
You see two pale vampires, they look weirdly a lot like Carmilla. And they almost have the same names..
There aren't that many vampires here, so we gotta stick together you know.
Thats.. actually why.. uhm.. I brought you here.
We wanna create a much bigger vampire community. But we don't have any male vampires..
You feel frightened! What have you gotten yourself into?
On the other hand, Carmilla is kinda hot. So would it be so bad not to run the hell away?
The voice telling you to run is getting smaller and smaller
So? Are you gonna chicken out? We are gonna turn you into a vampire.
Carmilla looks very happy, but in a cute way. Not scary at all actually.

Options.Name: Let her turn you into a vampire
Try to run away and get the hell out of here

Let her turn you into a vampire.Dialogue: You nod, and signalise that you're all hers.
YAY! I knew I could count on you. Let's go somewhere.. A bit more private.
You follow Carmilla up some stairs that leads to a small cozy room.
You do what you're told. She takes your arm, and washes it with a towel?..
You watch her hold your arm between both of her hands, and you prepare yourself for IT to happen
She opens her mouth wide, and bites!
The pain is unbearable! WHEN DOES IT STOP!?!
Carmilla kept on going for what felt like hours
It's getting really dark... And co.. ColD..
The pain turns into plessure, it would feel so good to just let go
You close your eyes, and let go.

Try to run away and get the hell out of.Dialogue: You notice a fire poker beside the fireplace.
So uhmmm.. I actually have plans that i forgot about. HAha.. Can we maybe do this another day?
You run towards the fireplace before Carmilla can even finish her sentence
You quickly grab the fire poker and take one last look at Carmillas face. She looks frightened and betrayed.
But without giving it another thought, you smash the fire poker right into the side of her head.
Carmilla is bursting in tears and screams, while her friends are trying to comfort her. They arent even trying to attack you
This is fucking sick- You. Are. Not. In. Control. Anymore.
Carmilla is laying on the ground like a hurt little dog.
You slowly walk over to Carmilla. You raise your hands high with the poker in your hand, and pierce the thing right through her eye and head!!!
The horrifying sounds of her screams fill the room completely..
You open your eyes and notice that you're in a completely white room. A tall man shows up in the door.

Go to your room and study.Dialogue: Sorry, I need to study for tommorow, so I don't fall behind you know.

Unpack your belongings.Dialogue: You decide to stay in your room and unpack all of your many blongings
